name: System Dot Connection
description:
System Alert: The server is running out of memory

> Game by Marcopole: https://marcopole.itch.io/
> Music & sounds by Natasha: https://itch.io/profile/nat-asha/
> Submision for Weekly Game Jam 138
> |

On this puzzle game, you have the mision to hack all the systems that you can before your memory drop to 0. Every system you hack will give you more time but, the puzzles will become harder and harder. How many systems can you hack before running out of memory and getting caught?

If you do a awesome run, you can save your score on the high scores, so all the players can see how good you are.
For other part, if you don't want to play with time, the game have a Practice Mode. Here you can play a level on the difficulty that you want without scores or countdowns.
